summary: RigRewards affiliate marketing platform will be rebuilt using the Internet Computer supported stack (Motoko backend canister(s) + React/TS + Tailwind + Internet Identity). Payments will NOT be on-chain ICRC-1; instead users pay the admin via off-app bank transfer, then admin manually confirms and credits the user's internal wallet balance, which users spend on rig purchases.
architectural_notes: Auth will use Internet Identity only (no email/password or Google OAuth).
Backend and persistence will be implemented in Motoko with canister-based storage (no PostgreSQL/Prisma).
Payments are off-app bank transfers; platform uses an internal credit balance that admins manually adjust/credit after confirmation.
Cron-like daily earnings/rewards will be implemented with IC timers.

existing_features.title: Implement an off-app bank payment deposit flow where users pay the admin outside the app and then request/record a deposit inside the app for admin review.
Add an admin panel workflow to confirm bank deposits and credit user wallets by a manually entered amount, with an auditable transaction trail.
Update rig/package purchasing to use internal wallet credits (available balance) as the payment method.
Add user-facing pages/components for viewing wallet balance, deposit request status, and transaction history, and admin-facing pages/components for deposit review and approval.
Apply a coherent, distinct visual theme for the RigRewards UI (colors, typography, layout) and enforce it consistently across user and admin areas.

new_feature_requests.summary: Rebuild RigRewards on Internet Computer stack (Motoko canister backend, React+TS frontend, Internet Identity auth, canister storage, timer-based cron simulation)
Implement offline bank-transfer deposit flow: admin manually credits user internal wallet balance after payment confirmation; users spend credits to purchase rigs
Admin panel features for manual deposits/credits: create credit entry, approve/track deposits, and record wallet transactions for audit
Define and enforce admin authorization in the backend for deposit approval and manual wallet crediting actions.
